content.en: Energy optimization: Researchers are using algorithms to optimize the utilization of green energy in cellular networks with hybrid energy supplies. These algorithms aim to maximize the use of renewable energy sources and minimize energy consumption costs. Additionally, algorithms are being used to improve the energy efficiency of heterogeneous networks by optimizing resource allocation, load balancing, and user association.
content.da: Energioptimering: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at optimere udnyttelsen af grøn energi i mobilnetværk med hybride energiforsyninger. Disse algoritmer har til formål at maksimere brugen af vedvarende energikilder og minimere energiomkostningerne. Derudover anvendes algoritmer til at forbedre energieffektiviteten i heterogene netværk ved at optimere ressourceallokering, belastningsbalancering og brugerassociations.
